verses.roman:
"prabhura svabhāva,-yebā dekhe sannidhāne
'svarūpa' anubhavi' tāṅre 'īśvara' kari' māne

synonyms: prabhura sva-bhāva—the characteristics of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yebā—anyone who; dekhe—sees; sannidhāne—nearby; sva-rūpa—His personality; anubhavi'-realizing; tāṅre—Him; īśvara kari'-as the Supreme Lord; māne—accepts.
translation: The Mahārāṣṭrian brāhmaṇa thought, "Whoever closely sees the characteristics of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu immediately realizes His personality and accepts Him as the Supreme Lord.
